verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We sense the burden From the heart of David The very same burden Which he swore to the Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saying, “I will not rest in my house, Nor can I lie on my bed. I’ll give no sleep to my eyes, Until the Lord’s Heart is met”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For His dwelling place And His holy throne Perfect resting place For the glory of God{/lang-eng}
